INVALID_CREATE:
Vous devez saisir les informations dans ce format : 

`{{prefix}}giveaway create [temps] [nombre de gagnants] [prix]`
MISSING_ID_REROLL: Vous devez entrer l'ID du message du concours pour lequel vous souhaitez choisir un nouveau gagnant!
MISSING_ID_DELETE: You must enter the message ID of the giveaway to delete!
MISSING_ID_END: You must enter the ID of the giveaway message to end!
NOT_FOUND: No giveaway found with message ID `{{messageID}}`
NOT_FOUND_ENDED: No **ended** giveaway found with message ID `{{messageID}}`
MAX_DURATION: The maximum duration of a giveaway is 15 days.
MAX_COUNT: The maximum of giveaways on the same server is 4.
